snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z Legends, Sega Saturn
snippet.description: Dragon Ball Z Legends for the Sega Saturn.  For eBay viewers, my disc is in good condition with a few scratches.  I played the original disc with a Saturn emulator, to show the game works and loads fine.
